'''Sir John Vincent Hurt''' [[Order of the British Empire|CBE]] ([[22 January]] [[1940]] - [[27 January]] [[2017]]) was a veteran British actor who voiced the role of [[Aragorn]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|the 1978 animated film of ''The Lord of the Rings'']].
